Present location: INSTITUT DE PAPYROLOGIE ET D'ÉGYPTOLOGIE, UNIVERSITÉ DE LILLE III [02/049] LILLE
Dating: 2ND INTERMEDIATE PERIOD (not after); MIDDLE KINGDOM (not before)
Name: Lid for a vase for cosmetics
Description: Circular-shaped lid for a vase for cosmetics with two flat surfaces.  The inferior surface bears at its centre a knob that could have nested into the opening of the vase.
